attributes.action: Ensure Stonehenge is free for tourists and prevent commercialisation of the site
attributes.background:
After visiting the site I was amazed English heritage were charging £14.50 per adult and £8.50
Per child for what was essentially a 2km bus journey and a roped walkway around the stones, this is a national monument and should not be commercialised in the way it has been.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for English Heritage, which is a registered charity.

You could raise this issue with English Heritage directly using the following website: http://www.english-heritage.org.uk/about-us/contact-us
